Message:
Something happened as I was
wandering to another battlefield.
A curious lot appeared before me.

There was a man with a staff,
and witches positioned
to protect him.

Not long after they appeared
did they completely wipe out
a horde of cursed creatures.

Just when I thought I could
finally die in a blaze of glory,
now I have to...

“I guess I just have to
make do at this point.
I’ll make you pay for
getting in my way...
with your life!”

I made my way towards
the man with the staff.
He seemed like the most
important one out of the lot.

“I bear no ill will
towards you... Sorry.”

But just as my blade
was about to strike him,
his staff suddenly started to shine.

At that moment,
the whispers urging me
to die were drowned out,
as his voice pierced
deep into my heart...
